title: Improving AGI System Performance
source: Research summary: 50. "best practices for enhancing AGI system performance"
design_insight: Optimizing AGI systems through robust architectures, efficient training techniques, and safety alignment.
experimental_trigger_patterns: Apply when AGI systems show limitations in scalability, adaptability, or encounter ethical safety issues.
background: Developed as AGI systems increasingly require scalable and adaptive frameworks to handle complex learning tasks with safety considerations.
algorithmic_innovation: Incorporating modular transformer architectures, adaptive learning rates, data augmentation, and reinforcement learning for improved AGI system efficiency and safety.
design_ai_instructions:
start: Institute modular transformer components for task specialization.
training: Use adaptive learning rates and second-order methods for faster convergence.
data_handling: Implement data augmentation and generate synthetic data to enrich learning sets.
safety: Ensure interpretability using explainable AI and incorporate regular robustness testing.
avoid: Overreliance on initial training data that may lead to overfitting.
